title: When are memberships up for renewal?
content:
Dear Joe, Jared, & Co.,

I don’t remember when my membership “UppercasePlus” is due and don’t want to become a deadbeat without even knowing it :-)

Can someone let me know when it is time to belly up and pay?

ChrisL

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806192821im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Deadbeat.jpg)

 [‹ In the papers - Josh, Mark and Gary](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806192821/http:/typophile.com/node/19626 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mac advice needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806192821/http:/typophile.com/node/19514 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content:
No comment from the bankers?

ChrisL

If memories serves, Joe or Jared posted in another thread about this same thing. Something about when they get the back-end working again they will figure out how to handle memberships more efficiently. Nope. I read it on the [membership page](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806192821/http:/typophile.com/membership).
